messages.message:
Hi folks, will look at this now ^

I think I just forgot to push the new crafting template. In the meantime, if you’re blocked by this, can set db_params in env-local-overrides.json as a temporary measure!

OK, I updated the template. Please *resync your sandbox* and run `cs restart` to restart all services. If you're still having trouble, check that `env-local-crafting.json` has `db_params` set -- if not, reach out to me!
Sorry about the blip & slow response here

Your env-local-crafting should look like this after the sync:
```cs/mfichman❯ cat shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local-crafting.json
{
    "base": {
        "admin_email": "<mailto:noreply+admin@instabase.com|noreply+admin@instabase.com>",
        "cache_host": "redis",
        "create_admin_account": "true",
        "create_ib_system_admin_account": "true",
        "create_instabase_account": "true",
        "es_k8s_server": "opensearch",
        "db_params": "--dialect=mysql --port=3306 --hostname=mysql --username=root --database=ibdb",
        "instabase_backend_db_params": "--dialect=mysql --port=3306 --hostname=mysql --username=root --database=ibdb",
        "instabase_email": "<mailto:noreply+instabase@instabase.com|noreply+instabase@instabase.com>",
        "rabbit_mq_url": "rabbitmq",
        "use_in_cluster_kube_config": false,
        "control_plane_kube_config_path": "/usr/local/etc/kubeconfig",
        "control_plane_api_token_encoded": "...",
        "control_plane_api_token": "...",
        "enable_automated_deployments": true,
        "namespace": "sandbox-mfichman",
        "service_search_host": "dev",
        "service_mount_host": "dev",
        "connector_image_tag": "mfichman",
        "instabase_uri": "https://https--mfichman-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run"

    },
    "docker-local": {
        "cache_host": "redis",
        "es_k8s_server": "opensearch",
        "db_params": "--dialect=mysql --port=3306 --hostname=mysql --username=root --database=ibdb",
        "rabbit_mq_url": "rabbitmq"
    }
}```

Hey @mfichman, looks like you re-updated the template, I noticed this in the morning IST and updated the template also :sweat_smile: - https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1748582009833849?thread_ts=1748580244.687069&cid=C05L87V014J
OK, no worries :slightly_smiling_face: FWIW the template is correct now.
By "the crafting template" you specifically mean the ib-dev-backend template, right?
That's correct. The other templates are unmaintained :confused:
